Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Get approval-in-principle in 60 seconds. Exclusive dining, shopping and travel privileges with The Good Life. Enjoy golf privileges all year round and access to 24-hour Platinum conceirge service.
Earn up to 300 reward points per month on existing banking relationships in deposits, mortgage, investments, when S$250 is charged to Platinum Credit Card.
Earn 2 points per S$1 charged to the credit card for spend of at least S$1,000 per month. Earn 1 point per S$1 charged for spend less than S$1,000 per month.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. S$138 Cashback if the application is submitted online. 2. S$100 Cashback if the application is submitted through other channels. 3. Promotion is valid till 30 June 2016.
